task.summary: feat: add logout button and clickable header

changelist.name: Changes
changelist.comment: feat: add logout button and clickable header

task.summary:
feat: add vacancy statistics modal and candidate skills functionality
- Add VacancyStatsModal component with detailed analytics - Display vacancy info (company, location, salary, employment type) - Show candidate statistics and status distribution - Include interview metrics and feedback analysis - Add conversion rate and time-in-system metrics
- Implement candidate skills feature - Add skills field to Candidate model and database schema - Create migration for skills column in candidate table - Update Pydantic schemas with skills validation - Add skills input field to candidate edit form - Display skills as badges on candidate detail page
- Enhance vacancy table with statistics button - Add BarChart3Icon button for opening statistics modal - Integrate VacancyStatsModal with vacancy table actions
- Improve dashboard with additional metrics - Add salary analysis and experience statistics - Include company and location diversity metrics - Add interview completion rates and feedback analysis - Enhance candidate detail page with interview statistics
- Update backend services for skills handling - Modify candidate service to handle JSON skills serialization - Add proper validation for skills array/string conversion - Ensure API compatibility with frontend skills format
- Fix JSX structure issues in candidate edit form - Remove redundant closing div tag causing JSX error - Improve form layout and validation
- Regenerate frontend API types - Update TypeScript types to match backend schema changes - Ensure proper type safety for skills field

MESSAGE.value: feat: add logout button and clickable header
